allQuestion.explanation: You may need to start giving others more space!

answers.text: Searched online for anything you could find on them.
Asked about them personally or through someone who knows them better.

allQuestion.text: Which of the following have you done to find out more about someone of interest?

allQuestion.explanation: You may need to start giving others more space!

answers.text: Hurry up so you can say hello.
Pick up the pace and follow them discreetly.
Follow them a long time, maybe taking a photo or getting close enough to hear or smell them.
Make sure they don't see you and get out of there!

allQuestion.text: You are out in public and see someone you're attracted to from afar. What do you do?

allQuestion.explanation: You may need to start giving others more space!

answers.text: Try to stay in touch unless they don't seem to want you to.
Give them space, hoping you can be friends someday.

allQuestion.text: Someone breaks up with you. How do you handle it?
